name: SEER Primary Tumor
title: SEER Primary Tumor
notes: **Note:** Code 0 (in situ) is not applicable for this schema.
rows:
Localized only
 
    Tumor confined to site of origin

    Localized, NOS
Stated as T1, T2, T3, or T4

Regional by direct extension only

Extension to:
    Adjacent tissue(s), NOS
    Connective tissue

Adjacent organs/structures including bone/cartilage:

Retroperitoneum (C480):
    Adrenal (suprarenal) gland
    Aorta
    Ascending colon
    Descending colon
    Kidney
    Pancreas
    Vena cava
    Vertebra

Peritoneum (C481):
    Colon (except ascending and descending colon)
    Esophagus
    Gallbladder
    Liver
    Small intestine
    Spleen
    Stomach

Unknown; extension not stated
Primary tumor cannot be assessed 
Not documented in patient record
